ast.util

Class SeqNum

  • java.lang.Object
    • ast.util.SeqNum

  • public class SeqNum
extends java.lang.Object
    Modular arithmetic. Instance constructed with SeqNum(B) performs sumation and comparison for integers modulo 2^B (range in [0 .. 2^B -1]). Valid values of B are in range [1 .. 32].

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int bits
      Size in number of bits of sequence numbers.
      int mask
      Sequence number with all bits to 1 (2^bits - 1).
      int signBit
      Sequence number with highest bit to 1 (2^(bits - 1)).

    • Constructor Summary

      SeqNum(int bits)

      Sumation modulo 2^bits (advance b times the sequence number a).

      Difference modulo 2^bits.
      boolean leq(int a, int b)
      leq(a,b) equivals to a == b || lt(a,b).

      Comparison modulo 2^bits.

    • Field Detail

      • bits

        public final int bits
        Size in number of bits of sequence numbers.

      • mask

        public final int mask
        Sequence number with all bits to 1 (2^bits - 1). Is the predecessor of 0.

      • signBit

        public final int signBit
        Sequence number with highest bit to 1 (2^(bits - 1)).

    • Method Detail

      • leq

        public boolean leq(int a,
                   int b)
        leq(a,b) equivals to a == b || lt(a,b).

      • lt

        public boolean lt(int a,
                  int b)
        Comparison modulo 2^bits. Returns a < b modulo 2^bits.

      • succ

        public int succ(int a)
        Successor of given sequence number.

      • pred

        public int pred(int a)
        Predecessor of given sequence number.

      • add

        public int add(int a,
               int b)
        Sumation modulo 2^bits (advance b times the sequence number a).

      • diff

        public int diff(int a,
                int b)
        Difference modulo 2^bits. Result r = diff(a,b) means equivalence add(b,r) == a.
